00046 /* Private definitions -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 /** @defgroup MISC_Private_Define MISC private definitions
00048   * @{
00049   */
00050 #define AIRCR_VECTKEY_MASK    ((u32)0x05FA0000)
00051 #define CTRL_TICKINT_SET      ((u32)0x00000002)
00052 #define CTRL_TICKINT_RESET    ((u32)0xFFFFFFFD)
00053 /**
00054   * @}
00055   */
00056

00058 /** @defgroup MISC_Exported_Functions MISC exported functions
00059   * @{
00060   */
00061 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00062   * @brief  Set the vector table location and Offset.
00063   * @param  NVIC_VectTable: Specify if the vector table is in FLASH or RAM.
00064   *   This parameter can be one of the following values:
00065   *     @arg NVIC_VECTTABLE_RAM
00066   *     @arg NVIC_VECTTABLE_FLASH
00067   * @param  NVIC_Offset: Vector Table base offset field.
00068   *   This value must be a multiple of 0x100.
00069   * @retval None
00070   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00071 void NVIC_SetVectorTable(u32 NVIC_VectTable, u32 NVIC_Offset)
00072 {
00073   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00074   Assert_Param(IS_NVIC_VECTTABLE(NVIC_VectTable));
00075   Assert_Param(IS_NVIC_OFFSET(NVIC_Offset));
00076 
00077   SCB->VTOR = NVIC_VectTable | (NVIC_Offset & (u32)0x1FFFFF80);
00078 }
00079 
00080 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00081   * @brief  Select which low power mode to execute to the system.
00082   * @param  NVIC_LowPowerMode:  Specify the new low power mode to execute to the system.
00083   *   This parameter can be one of the following values:
00084   *     @arg NVIC_LOWPOWER_SEVONPEND
00085   *     @arg NVIC_LOWPOWER_SLEEPDEEP
00086   *     @arg NVIC_LOWPOWER_SLEEPONEXIT
00087   * @param  NewState: new state of low power condition.
00088   *   This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.
00089   * @retval None
00090   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00091 void NVIC_LowPowerConfig(u8 NVIC_LowPowerMode,  ControlStatus NewState)
00092 {
00093   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00094   Assert_Param(IS_NVIC_LOWPOWER(NVIC_LowPowerMode));
00095   Assert_Param(IS_CONTROL_STATUS(NewState));
00096 
00097   if (NewState != DISABLE)
00098   {
00099     SCB->SCR |= NVIC_LowPowerMode;
00100   }
00101   else
00102   {
00103     SCB->SCR &= (u32)(~(u32)NVIC_LowPowerMode);
00104   }
00105 }
00106 
00107 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00108   * @brief  Set the pending bit for a system handler.
00109   * @param  SystemHandler: Specify the system handler pending bit to be set.
00110   *   This parameter can be one of the following values:
00111   *     @arg SYSTEMHANDLER_NMI
00112   *     @arg SYSTEMHANDLER_PSV
00113   *     @arg SYSTEMHANDLER_SYSTICK
00114   * @retval None
00115   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00116 void NVIC_SetPendingSystemHandler(u32 SystemHandler)
00117 {
00118   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00119   Assert_Param(IS_NVIC_SYSTEMHANDLER(SystemHandler));
00120 
00121   /* Set the corresponding System Handler pending bit                                                       */
00122   SCB->ICSR |= SystemHandler;
00123 }
00124 
00125 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00126   * @brief  Configure the SysTick clock source.
00127   * @param  SysTick_ClockSource: Specify the SysTick clock source.
00128   *   This parameter can be one of the following values:
00129   *     @arg SYSTICK_SRC_STCLK  : External reference clock is selected as SysTick clock source.
00130   *     @arg SYSTICK_SRC_FCLK   : AHB clock is selected as SysTick clock source.
00131   * @retval  None
00132   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00133 void SYSTICK_ClockSourceConfig(u32 SysTick_ClockSource)
00134 {
00135   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00136   Assert_Param(IS_SYSTICK_CLOCK_SOURCE(SysTick_ClockSource));
00137 
00138   if (SysTick_ClockSource == SYSTICK_SRC_FCLK)
00139   {
00140     SysTick->CTRL |= SYSTICK_SRC_FCLK;
00141   }
00142   else
00143   {
00144     SysTick->CTRL &= SYSTICK_SRC_STCLK;
00145   }
00146 }
00147 
00148 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00149   * @brief  Enable or Disable the SysTick counter.
00150   * @param  SysTick_Counter: new state of the SysTick counter.
00151   *   This parameter can be one of the following values:
00152   *     @arg SYSTICK_COUNTER_DISABLE  : Disable counter
00153   *     @arg SYSTICK_COUNTER_ENABLE   : Enable counter
00154   *     @arg SYSTICK_COUNTER_CLEAR    : Clear counter value to 0
00155   * @retval None
00156   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00157 void SYSTICK_CounterCmd(u32 SysTick_Counter)
00158 {
00159   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00160   Assert_Param(IS_SYSTICK_COUNTER(SysTick_Counter));
00161 
00162   if (SysTick_Counter == SYSTICK_COUNTER_CLEAR)
00163   {
00164     SysTick->VAL = SYSTICK_COUNTER_CLEAR;
00165   }
00166   else
00167   {
00168     if (SysTick_Counter == SYSTICK_COUNTER_ENABLE)
00169     {
00170       SysTick->CTRL |= SYSTICK_COUNTER_ENABLE;
00171     }
00172     else
00173     {
00174       SysTick->CTRL &= SYSTICK_COUNTER_DISABLE;
00175     }
00176   }
00177 }
00178 
00179 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00180   * @brief  Enable or Disable the SysTick Interrupt.
00181   * @param  NewState: new state of the SysTick Interrupt.
00182   *   This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.
00183   * @retval None
00184   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00185 void SYSTICK_IntConfig(ControlStatus NewState)
00186 {
00187   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00188   Assert_Param(IS_CONTROL_STATUS(NewState));
00189 
00190   if (NewState != DISABLE)
00191   {
00192     SysTick->CTRL |= CTRL_TICKINT_SET;
00193   }
00194   else
00195   {
00196     SysTick->CTRL &= CTRL_TICKINT_RESET;
00197   }
00198 }
00199 
00200 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00201   * @brief  Set SysTick counter reload value.
00202   * @param  SysTick_Reload: SysTick reload new value.
00203   *   This parameter must be a number between 1 and 0xFFFFFF.
00204   * @retval None
00205   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00206 void SYSTICK_SetReloadValue(u32 SysTick_Reload)
00207 {
00208   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00209   Assert_Param(IS_SYSTICK_RELOAD(SysTick_Reload));
00210 
00211   SysTick->LOAD = SysTick_Reload;
00212 }
00213 
00214 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00215   * @brief  Reverse bits.
00216   * @param  in: Input data
00217   * @retval uRBIT
00218   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00219 u32 RBIT(u32 in)
00220 {
00221   u32 uRBIT = 0;
00222   s32 i;
00223 
00224   for(i = 31; i >=0; i--)
00225   {
00226     uRBIT |= ((in & 0x1) << i);
00227     in = in >> 1;
00228   }
00229 
00230   return uRBIT;
00231 }
